articles.title: LeBron James' first career 20-20 line powers Lakers' OT win - ESPN India
articles.description: "I've done some pretty cool things in my career," said LeBron James after the Lakers' thrilling OT win over the Grizzlies gave them a commanding 3-1 series lead. "I've never had 20 and 20 before."
